author: MetalMaarten
post_text: March 6, 2015 at 7:15 PM#1Hi all,I would like to use the name text from a que in my macro. What is the syntax for this? So for example, I would like to fill a variable with the name text of cue 100 of the selected executor. Been searching here in the forum, but couldn't find an aswer so far.Thanks!Maarten

posts.post_text: March 6, 2015 at 11:53 PM#2this is not possible.there is no commandlinesyntax for extracting data into variables.
